returns._0: The address of the auto-claim account

params.streamId: The ID of the stream to close

returns._0: The address of the fee recipient

params.streamId: The ID of the stream to retrieve information about

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.streamId: The ID of the stream to pause

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.streamId: The ID of the stream to resume

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to withdraw
params.streamId: The ID of the stream to withdraw from

autoClaimAccount().notice: Retrieves the account used for auto-claiming

tokenFeeRate(address).notice: Retrieves the fee of the token
